interactables.label: Bookshelf
interactables.examineText: Academic texts. Physics. Astronomy. Marine biology. One shelf is dedicated to folklore: 'Innsmouth', 'The Dunwich Horror', 'Deep Ones of the Pacific'. Fiction?
interactables.examineTextLowSanity: The books rearrange themselves when you're not looking. The folklore section has expanded. Your name is on one of the spines.

interactables.label: Desk
interactables.examineText: Grandfather's desk. A half-finished letter: 'The covenant cannot be broken. She made the pact in 1967 to save the village. Every 60 years, the sea demands... The rest is torn away.
interactables.examineTextLowSanity: The letter is complete now. It describes the ritual. It describes YOU. It describes what happens at 3:33 AM. You check your phone. It's 3:32.

interactables.label: Locked Drawer
interactables.examineText: A drawer hidden beneath the desk. A map is folded inside.

interactables.label: Strange Book
interactables.examineText: A book bound in something that isn't leather. The text inside shifts. You can almost read it. You shouldn't read it.
interactables.examineTextLowSanity: You read it. You understand it. You wish you didn't. The geometry of the words rearranges your thoughts. You know what sleeps beneath the waves. You know it's waking.

navigation.label: Shortcut to Shrine
navigation.lockedText: The air is thick. You do not yet know the way.

events.message: The truth consumes you. (Ending: Cosmic Truth)
A voice slips into your ear: 'The shrine waits. The sea remembers.'
